ACTION BASEBALL LEAGUE
ALL TRANSACTIONS
12/31/1980
BNN Index | ABL | SCORES | STANDINGS | STATS | TEAMS | PLAYERS | TRANSACTIONS | HISTORY
 
Wednesday, December 31st , 1980
San Francisco Warriors: Signed free agent RP Jerry Ortega to a minor league contract.
Dallas Rustlers: Signed international amateur SS Jonathan Martinez out of Dominican Republic to a minor league contract.
New York Aces: Signed international amateur SS Ramon Palomeque out of Dominican Republic to a minor league contract.
The Atlanta Kings traded 24-year old RHP Elias Ruela to the Dallas Rustlers, getting 29-year old LHP Tony Resendiz (retaining 75%) in return.
Tuesday, December 30th , 1980
Charlotte Colonels: Signed free agent LF Dustin Meredith to a 2-year contract worth a total of $816,000.
San Francisco Warriors: Signed free agent 3B Chad Averitt to a 2-year contract worth a total of $1,700,000.
Cincinnati Cougars: Signed free agent 3B Pablo Loureiro to a minor league contract with a major league option.
San Francisco Warriors: Signed free agent SP Kyle Chambers to a 1-year contract worth a total of $402,000.
San Francisco Warriors: RP Adrian Brown was designated for assignment, placed on waivers and taken off the secondary (40-man) roster.
San Francisco Warriors: RP Ricardo Adorno was designated for assignment, placed on waivers and taken off the secondary (40-man) roster.
New York Aces: Signed free agent SP Johnny Romero to a minor league contract.

Thursday, November 6th , 1980
Denver Rocketeers: Signed Manager Greg Asche to a 5-year, $100,000 per year contract.

Atlanta Kings: Released former Rule 5 draft pick LF Aaron Jackson, returned to original Organization Cincinnati Cougars.
Wednesday, June 4th , 1980
Miami Hurricanes: Activated SS Jalen Smith from the restricted list.
Miami Hurricanes: Placed CL Hugo Ochoa on the 60-day injured list.
Miami Hurricanes: CF David Ford was designated for assignment and placed on irrevocable waivers.
St. Louis Stallions: Released RP Alex Reyes.
Denver Rocketeers: SP Paul Conlon returns from his rehab assignment.
Denver Rocketeers: Placed SP Paul Conlon on the 60-day injured list.
Las Vegas Gamblers: SP Miguel Fernandez returns from his rehab assignment.
Las Vegas Gamblers: RP Danny Sanchez was designated for assignment and placed on irrevocable waivers.
San Francisco Warriors: Activated SP Arturo Andres from the restricted list.
San Francisco Warriors: SP Isaiah Wilson was designated for assignment and placed on irrevocable waivers.
Tampa Bay Storm: Activated RP Emilio Ortega from the injured list.
Houston Mavericks: Placed 1B Manuel Coleman on the 10-day injured list, retroactive to 06/01/1980.
Atlanta Kings: Activated 2B Bobby McKellar from the injured list.
Atlanta Kings: Sent 2B Bobby McKellar to Triple A Sunrise Manor for injury rehab.
Chicago Fire: Released RP David Delgado.
Los Angeles Cobras: Signed free agent RP Antonio Gonzalez to a minor league contract.
New York Aces: Signed free agent SP Julian Marquez to a minor league contract.
Chicago Fire: Signed free agent SP Matt Marziale to a minor league contract.

Saturday, June 18th , 2022 - OOTP Baseball 23.4 Build 64
